channel.title: opencv on Isaac Changhau
channel.description: Recent content in opencv on Isaac Changhau

item.title: Removing Backscatter to Enhance the Visibility of Underwater Object
item.description: A novel method based on underwater optical model for underwater object visibility enhancement and its implementation.

item.title: Underwater Image Enhance via Fusion and Its Java Implementation
item.description: Restoring underwater images and videos via fusion technique and its Java implementation.

item.title: Adaptive Local Tone Mapping Technique for HDR Image and Java Implementation
item.description: Image enhancement approach via adaptive local tone mapping and its Java implementation.

item.title: Installation of OpenCV for Java
item.description: Tutorial about installing OpenCV toolkit for Java.
